topic.title: 官网、GitHub及所有Trackers都被封的情况下使用ZeroNet。
topic.body:
想让ZeroNet在GFW封锁完所有Trackers后，又不想翻墙，还想更新ZeroNet及Trackers，正常使用ZeroNet的话，那你必需要打开
http://127.0.0.1:43110/ZeroUpdate.bit
 这样子，即使官网、GitHub及所有trackers被封，仍可以等待Nofish为中国用户更新ZeroNet及Trackers（海外帮忙输血）。

topic.title: Donald J. Trump, we are looking forward of your first tweet in China :)

3_1H5UJ7LneToGqYqJ9fbLnu1Ko2pxTpchof.body:
Freedom post want you want, nobody can shut you up, this is the main reason :)
If the site owner shut me up, I can make my own site easily.

6_18Cxdyc2FEuswoXnBkrAfCkM2Yu1p4NjcR.body: What are your guys talking about, I can NOT understand as a Chinese guy :)

> [redfish](#comment_15_1KGozab6jp6jA6zVM8cTFdzMmBasriNP4f): About free speech. How's that going in China, btw?

The Great Wall is highter than before.

> [redfish](#comment_17_1KGozab6jp6jA6zVM8cTFdzMmBasriNP4f): Walls are a good thing, except for walls that block access to information about walls being a good thing.

:)

1_14ccHsTEw2phfTgGvJ8uzXigyCRdpwTi73.body: 迫害妄想症，还不轻呢。屏蔽大法送你进小黑屋

1_1LajFt4rB1nREhyTfDt2VW4C8TmBy51vc4.body: 发现这贴子回复竟然两百多！/震惊

1509173093_13DHTaNjuTFdYzXMEzssAm1PW49oC.body: 可选文件，并且你要持续做种一段时间。

1509083306_1G2KAr146veEMjvkrhD3sXMUH1fAu.body:
> [lava](#comment_4_1KyNzrBTMpi7LSmsrjnKS6mf15jRuFFN4H): 国际互联网英文影响力如此之大，英语国家有考虑小语种国家的感情吗 [...]

主要是人家不学中文，至少我们学过英文。零网的开发者是匈牙利的，如果他用的是匈牙利文搞零网，我觉得你不会再用了。
就像一堆阿拉伯文摆在你面前你也会崩溃。

1510141321_16tWPYFLbad3R8iGcMuetyiwC2q5q.body:
> [zerogroup](#comment_11_12WSTdqNMmtLct48peM9QFDZEojTm9c3g3): 什么鬼，in china 就不能说中文吗

出门，左拐，不送。
http://127.0.0.1:43110/NewGFWTalk.bit/

> [vizy93](#comment_1_1KieR53aUzHPPH7b54QyDN5a8iYdZm4r9o): Are people behind the Great Firewall even allowed to use Twitter???
No
